Articles.Content:
Hi all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) So I have a couple of questions here if I may.

I havnt updated my mods via CKAN for a while so last night I decided to do it. All went well with the update so I carried on with my sandbox mission, docking another part to my spacestation. I left Kerbin with a rocket of mine which had a KR-2L+ "Rhino" engine strapped to the bottom. The launch went well and my idea was to use this same engine to achieve orbit as I had plenty of deltaV.

I shut my engine down when I hit my required apaoapsis, set a manouver node and went to fire up the engine again......nothing happened!! I was informed that I had no more ignitions left?? Ive never seen this before so I reverted back to the VAB, right clicked the engine and it said I had 2 available ingnitions?

Am I doing something wrong here?

Another thing I have noticed is that in the VAB, when I goto the fuel tank builder I seem to have my FASA engines in there too? Ive used FASA for a while now and never noticed this before?

Before I posted these questions I did a full, clean install. Any help would be much appreciated as its doing my head in!! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sounds like you have RealFuels and an engine config pack installed...

> 
> Sounds like you have RealFuels and an engine config pack installed...

Ill check 2morrow. Funny thing is I havnt installed any new mods for weeks so something has definitely changed....ive half a space station in orbit and now I get this....
